statements: SELECT * FROM acls WHERE id = 1;
SELECT resource, role FROM acls WHERE id > 5;
SELECT permission, user_id FROM acls WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM acls WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, resource, permission FROM acls ORDER BY resource DESC, id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM acls WHERE id = 1
SELECT resource, permission FROM acls WHERE role = 'admin' ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT DISTINCT role FROM acls WHERE user_id = 100 GROUP BY role
SELECT * FROM acls WHERE permission IN ('read', 'write') AND user_id > 500 ORDER BY updated_at ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, resource, created_at FROM acls WHERE id BETWEEN 5 AND 10
SELECT * FROM network_resources_acl;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM network_resources_acl WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT resource_id, user_id FROM resource_permissions WHERE permission_type = 'read';
SELECT * FROM network_resources_acl ORDER BY resource_type DESC;
SELECT resource_name, access_level FROM network_resources_acl WHERE resource_type = 'database';
SELECT * FROM network_resources_acl WHERE resource_type = 'Database';
SELECT resource_id, resource_name FROM network_resources_acl WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM network_resources_acl WHERE access_level IS NOT NULL ORDER BY resource_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT resource_type FROM network_resources_acl;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type, user_id FROM network_resources_acl JOIN resource_permissions ON network_resources_acl.resource_id = resource_permissions.resource_id;
SELECT * FROM acl_users;
SELECT username, password FROM acl_users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM acl_users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM acl_resources ORDER BY resource_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM acl_roles WHERE role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT user_id, username FROM acl_users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM acl_users WHERE username LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM acl_roles WHERE role_id > 3 ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM acl_resources WHERE resource_type = 'database' ORDER BY resource_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM acl_users u JOIN acl_roles r ON u.user_id = r.role_id WHERE u.user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM network_resources;
SELECT resource_id, resource_name FROM network_resources;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type, resource_permission FROM network_resources ORDER BY resource_name DESC;
SELECT role_name, role_description FROM user_roles WHERE role_name LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT permission_type, permission_description FROM user_permissions LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM network_resources WHERE resource_type = 'server';
SELECT resource_id, resource_name FROM network_resources WHERE resource_permission = 'read';
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM network_resources WHERE resource_permission = 'write' ORDER BY resource_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE role_name LIKE 'admin%';

SELECT role_name, role_description FROM user_roles JOIN role_permissions ON user_roles.role_id = role_permissions.role_id WHERE permission_id IN (SELECT permission_id FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_type = 'access');
SELECT * FROM network_resources_acl
SELECT resource_name, access_level FROM network_resources_acl WHERE resource_id = 1
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_role_mapping ORDER BY role_id DESC
SELECT permission_name FROM user_permissions WHERE description IS NOT NULL
SELECT role_id, permission_id FROM role_permissions LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM network_resources_acl WHERE resource_id = 1;
SELECT resource_name, access_level FROM network_resources_acl WHERE access_level = 'admin' ORDER BY resource_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(resource_id) AS total_resources FROM network_resources_acl GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(resource_id) > 2;

SELECT role_name, permission_name FROM user_roles INNER JOIN role_permissions ON user_roles.role_id = role_permissions.role_id INNER JOIN user_permissions ON role_permissions.permission_id = user_permissions.permission_id;
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM user_role_mapping INNER JOIN user_roles ON user_role_mapping.role_id = user_roles.role_id WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY role_name ASC;
